description:
Grey, damp days mean grippy dirt and less bike traffic on your commute. When you need more protection than shorts can provide, but you don’t need a full on rain pant, the Cadence cycle pants have you covered. With a weather resistant front panel and a stretchy back panel, these pants let you meet chilly winds and light rain, head on.

  • Lightweight polyester front panel helps block the elements and has a slight mechanical stretch
  • Breathable polyester blend back panel helps keep you cool and has plenty of stretch
  • Articulated knees for bunch-free pedalling
  • Elastic waistband and drawcord for that just right fit
  • Reflective stripes on the lower leg increase visibility
  • Zippered cuffs make it easy to get these pants on and off
  • Size tag doubles as a locker loop, making it easy to hang your pants
  • Slim athletic fit stays out of your drivetrain, while still leaving room for liner shorts and low-profile knee pads
name: MEC Cadence Cycle Pants - Men's
